p:
SARS-CoV-2 was first identified from patient samples in Wuhan, China. Human airway epithelial cells were cultured with the virus from BAL fluid isolated from patients. Supernatant was collected from cells that were damaged or killed and analyzed by negative-stained transmission electron microscopy ( Figure 2 ).
13 The images revealed that the virus has a diameter ranging from 60 to 140 nm, has an envelope with protein spikes, and has genetic material.
14 The overall structure looks similar to other viruses from the Coronaviridae family.
